mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_table(boardtitle, boardwriter, boardpass, boardcontents) values(#{boardDto.boardTitle}, #{boardDto.boardWriter}, #{boardDto.boardPass}, #{boardDto.boardContents})
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardtitle, boardwriter, boardhits, TO_CHAR(createdat, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS createdAt FROM board_table ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_table SET boardhits = boardhits + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
